Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent of RSS aid during the Kerala floods by stating that RSS workers were present in all eleven districts of the state.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the images shared by Postcard News were actually from relief work during the Kollam Temple fire in 2016, not the Kerala floods.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that RSS provided significant aid during the Kerala floods.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the assumption that the RSS relief work during the Kollam Temple fire in 2016 can be equated to their aid during the Kerala floods, which may not be accurate.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the images shared by Postcard News were misleading and did not accurately represent the RSS aid during the Kerala floods.
